snippet: An airplane mechanic from New Jersey known among colleagues for his vocal support for the Islamic State is charged with planning to support the group, after flying to Turkey.
abstract: Terrorism trial of Tairod Pugh, New Jersey native and Muslim convert suspected of sympathizing with Islamic extremest groups after working as American contractor across Middle East, centers on whether he took steps to join Islamic State.
